column2: DWRLF Project Number (for ALL IIJA projects add either a '-GS', '-EC', '-LSLI', or 'LSLR' to the end)

column10: IIJA-LSLR -Continued from Loan 2 LSL-Inventory and Replacement FYI - SWBNO estimated removal of LSL to be a multi-decade program. Taking costs from current public bids for both LSL removal and street paving costs, SWBNO estimates an average cost of $12,569.42 per LSL replaced, for approximately 1,313 LSL replaced per year. Loan Term = 30 Years IIJA-LSLR (49% PF)
To conduct a Lead Service Line Inventory of the Welsh Water System.
